prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell and a long tongue.
I want a cute Pokemon that has a round body and is purple.
Generate a small aquatic creature with sharp spikes on its shell.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a mollusk with a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in underwater caves and has a vivid color.
Design a creature that uses its tongue to capture food in the sea.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a clam and has a unique shell design.
